group_1.textLeft: Welcome back, Sudachi.

group_1.textRight: How was your New Year's visit back home?
Ehehe, Mom and Dad spoiled me so much!

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad to hear the time with your parents@went well.

group_1.textRight: Ah— this is a souvenir! From Mom and Dad.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry for havin' yer parents go through@the trouble...
Give 'em ma regards.

group_1.textRight: Sure!

group_1.textLeft: That reminds me, didn't ya have an interview@with the teachers at yer elementary school?
How'd it go?

group_1.textRight: Well... It wasn't anything special, I guess?
If I'm doing well, if I'm eating enough.

group_1.textLeft: They sure care about ya.
They must rightly be relieved knowin'@yer doing well.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
...Ah, but I also had winter holiday homework.
Like kakizome.

group_1.textLeft: Your first calligraphy of the year...@That brings back memories.
Then why don't y'all give it a try too, Yozuru.@I bet she'd get it done faster than workin' alone.

group_1.textRight: If Teacher says so, then I will try.
Fumumu.

group_1.textLeft: I finished writing as well.
Let's see 'em...

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Even if it's just for one day, go to school.]@[textBlack:　　　Sudachi Sawa]

group_1.textLeft: Ohh, now there's a fine resolution.

group_1.textRight: Fumu, fumunmumufumumu,@fumufumumumufumumun.

group_1.textLeft: Even if it's jus' a small one,@ya wanna take a step forward...?
The first step's the hardest, so do yer best.

group_1.textRight: Fumu—!

group_1.textLeft: And Yozuru's...

group_1.narration: [textBlack:Become a nursery school teacher.]@[textBlack:　　　Yozuru Sasame]

group_1.textLeft: Nursery teacher...?@That a dream of yers?

group_1.textRight: No, it is nothing of the sort.
I was simply thinking of how to improve my kindness—where I could show it—
and children had come to mind.
A child is the object of kind, gentle protection.

group_1.textLeft: I see, ya really thought it out.
Goodness gracious, ya do yer best too, Yozuru.

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Well now, one piece of homework's outta the way,@so how's about we head out?

group_1.textRight: Where to?
Fumu?

group_1.textLeft: It'd be right impolite not greeting the kid@who protected our future now.
'Sides, y'all going out and takin' steps towards@your own futures—
wouldn't she just be delighted knowin' that?
